title: Help
body: Is there anyway i could get a download of league 6.12.1 so i can watch an old analyze or feed replay? thanks!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately, Riot doesn't house or host old patches anywhere. I'm not aware of any third party sites that offer this service, but I'd be reluctant to trust them to offer clean files without anything sketchy inside. There's also the issue that if your PC is online, the client would try to automatically patch to the newest version if it launched, so I'm not sure if what you're asking for is entirely feasible. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Wow ty for the hasty reply! i'll just hold on to this file forever just knowing i cant watch it and sort of just have it as a sentimental thing :3
